text: Sediminibacillus halophilus is a Gram-positive, moderately halophilic, rod- shaped and motile bacterium from the genus of Sediminibacillus which has been isolated from sediments from the Lake Erliannor from the Mongolia. ==References== Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2008
title: Sediminibacillus halophilus
